SEARCH
Module edu.ntnu.stud
Package edu.ntnu.stud.controllers

Class ChaosGameController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.stud.controllers.ChaosGameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class ChaosGameController extends Object
This class is the controller for the Chaos Game application. It extends the Controller interface and is responsible for handling user input and updating the view and model accordingly.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ChaosGameController(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    Constructs a new ChaosGameController with the given stage.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    update(Event event)
    Updates the Chaos Game view when an event occurs The event can be related to dark mode, running steps, updating the canvas size, or opening the description dialogue.
    void
    update(Event event, Object data)
    Updates the Chaos Game view when an event occurs The event can be related to running the chaos game, setting a preset, loading a file, or saving a file.
    void
    update(Event event, Object... data)
    Updates the Chaos Game view when an event occurs The event is related to updating the description of the chaos game.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
